degree: Bachelor's degree, Computer Science and Philosophy
description:
GPA: 3.77, 4.0 in Computer Science and Philosophy
Pursuing a double major in Computer Science and Philosophy as well as a certificate in innovation and entrepreneurship. All computer science classes taken through Harvey Mudd.
Activities and Societies: Seaver Scholar (full tuition merit scholarship), Center for Innovations and Entrepreneurship Fellow Candidate, Quantum Records founding member and CTO of on campus music events club, Participated in Harvey Mudd Incubator with NextUp, Completed research fellowship at the Gould Center.

GPA: 4.03 Unweighted, 4.82 Weighted
Activities and Societies: Economics Club, Mock Trial Club, SAVE club, Indoor and Outdoor Varsity Track and Field Captain.
